name: YouTube Teal & Black (Dark Minimalist Theme)
description:
Just another dark theme based on Black and Teal (blue-green) colors.

It use the same approach as my other style

    * Google Teal & Black (Dark Minimalist Theme) http://userstyles.org/styles/36288

Please report any bug or possible improvement.

****** In the next update I will try to remove annoying lines that give table aspect to the page *******

Update 16 October 2010
+ improved buttons style
x fixed search suggestions
x fixed inbox sidebar links
x fixed many section subheaders
x fixed my channel
x fixed footer
x fixed account button popup background

Update 04 October 2010
x fixed main content background when logged
x fixed background when moving on a video thumb on sidebar
x fixed on mouse hover comment background
x fixed on mouse hover video caption
x fixed color for video views counter
x fixed color for main video caption
x fixed background color for inbox items
x fixed header on account settings
x fixed selected sidebar tab on account settings
x fixed comments author yellow background
